reviews.customers_say: Customers find the sweater comfortable, not itchy, and appreciate its warm, thick material that wraps them in warmth.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars A really nice thick comfy sweater good material. It’s just cute.
items.body: This is a really cute, nice thick adorable sweater dress. I didn’t like the way it looked on me. Maybe I got a size too big I’m gonna try it again in a lower size, but I like the material I like the styling I like that it had pockets But I have wide hips and I felt like maybe I got it too big but it is mad cute I am gonna buy it again in a smaller size cause it is nice and baggy. I know it’ll look fantastic with some tall boots. Read more
items.author: consumer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Pink Queen Women's Loose Turtleneck Oversize Long Pullover Sweater Dress: A Style Masterpiece
items.body: Hold onto your scarves and chunky boots because this Pink Queen Turtleneck Sweater Dress is about to turn your winter wardrobe into a wonderland of cozy chic! This isn’t just any sweater dress—it’s a pullover revelation that redefines comfort and elegance. Let’s start with the fit—oversized, but in the most flattering way possible. It wraps you in warmth like your favorite blanket, but with a silhouette that screams sophistication. The loose turtleneck? Iconic. It not only frames your face beautifully but adds an element of effortless glam, making it perfect for any occasion—be it a fireside coffee date or a casual stroll through a winter market. And the fabric! Luxuriously soft with a hint of stretch, this dress feels like a gentle hug that lasts all day. It's thick enough to keep out the chill but light enough to move with you, providing the perfect balance of warmth and freedom. You’ll never want to take it off! But what truly sets this dress apart is its versatility. Pair it with leggings and ankle boots for a daytime look, or go full-on fashionista with thigh-high boots and a bold belt for a night out. Either way, you’ll be turning heads and setting trends. In short, the Pink Queen Turtleneck Sweater Dress is not just a piece of clothing—it’s a statement. A statement that says, “I’m cozy, I’m stylish, and I’m ready to conquer the season!” So go ahead, embrace your inner queen, and let this sweater dress be your royal robe of winter fashion. Read more
items.author: Wehash Technology

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars 5'2", 230 lbs, XL, Fits my arms! Comfy, long, soft and lightweight!
items.body: 5'2" 230 lbs, XL Black. It fits my big arms and shoulders! Really like it! Love the pockets! Yes, they stick out but my hands are usually in them. I wish the length was a little shorter because the pockets are too low for me but I haven't washed it yet. I wanted a cozy lightweight sweater to cover my stomach and bikini area, if you know what I mean...and it does just that. It is 100% Acrylic but not itchy and I'm sure it will soften up even more after washing. I am wearing a tank top underneath. I intend to wear for comfort and hanging out. Looks better than a sweatshirt. I wish the price was lower, but I will likely purchase another one. I may try a L but will see how it washes first. It does smell like body odor out of the bag, yuck! But, I'm not worried because I will wash it. I also love how it is tagless in the neck! TIP ON KNOWING THE FRONT: There is thick stitch that is on the neck on left as well as a tag on the lower left inside. This is how I know 'my front'. It fits me better on top. Otherwise, it looks like it can be worn either way. I ordered it yesterday and it arrived today! Very happy with this purchase! PS: the spots on my photos are from my mirror, not on the sweater. Sorry about that. :) Read more
items.author: Andrea

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Really comfortable and cute!
items.body: I just bought this and it was perfect really flattering and perfect for a casual day! I'll get more colors! Read more
items.author: Lola G

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great fit - plus size but not slouchy
items.body: Wonderful sweater. It’s long enough to be a short dress or wear with pants. Super warm and the pockets are perfect. I love that they connected the pockets to the sweater instead of letting them just flail about. I bought two and will buy more when I can. Read more
items.author: Jinny Zwolak

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Not good value for acrylic sweater
items.body: I actually like the sweater: Good fit and style if a bit too long, not too scratchy for being acrylic, and the chemical smell wore off quickly. But it doesn't have a quality feel for the price. If price was lower by $10-15 I would buy several in different colors. Read more
items.author: Kate

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great sweater dress
items.body: What a wonderful, warm, well made sweater/sweater dress. It is nice and thick as well as very soft and pretty. It can be worn with leggings or as a stand alone dress. The pockets are nice and will keep your hands warm or hold your phone, although I am sure the phone would cause it to pull the sweater down on that side. It is an over sized style so if you want form fitting you might want to order down a size. I am 5'3 and weigh 128 pounds. I like my clothes to fit very loosely so I ordered a large and it fits just the way I like it but for my size a medium would have also fit with room left over. It came just above my knees. I would buy again and not hesitate to give as a gift. Highly recommended. Read more
items.author: Margaret

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cozy
items.body: Warm and cozy. The color is beautiful. I receive many compliments when I wear it. Read more
items.author: emctsu

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.
about_this_item:
Womens Maxi Dress is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Brown, Y - Blue, Black, Coffee, Rose Red, Plaid Navy Blue, Light Purple, Light Beige, Y - Yellow, Y -Brown and Apricot, Deep Apricot Pink, Y - Beige, Gray, Y - Dark Blue. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
